test.instr: (:ins (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X yellow) (sort Y television))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X desk))) (:task (give human X) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X green))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X black) (sort Y airconditioner))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X white) (sort Y cupboard))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X can) (color X red))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X blue) (sort Y cupboard))) )
test.nl: The door of the cupboard is closed. There is a book which is yellow on the television. Go to the desk. Give human a remotecontrol which is green. Put the black bottle on the airconditioner. Put a cup which is white on the cupboard. Put down the red can. Take out the blue can from the cupboard.
